addALesson(Course, Teacher, String, String, String, String) - Method in class view.AnchorPaneNode
This method validates the user input and if the user input is correct then it adds the lesson to the schedule
addALessonDisplay() - Method in class view.AnchorPaneNode
This method generates a popup to add the lesson.This method is called when you right-click on an AnchorPaneNode
addClass(ClassOfStudents) - Method in class model.courses.ClassList
The purpose of this method is to add a class to the classList ArrayList and then sort the classes by their name using a compare method

addLesson(Lesson) - Method in class model.calendar.Day
Sets the date of the given lesson to the date field of the day.

addTeacher(Teacher) - Method in class model.courses.TeacherList
The purpose of this method is to add a new teacher to the teacherList ArrayList
AnchorPaneNode - Class in view
AnchorPaneNode holds the information of the lesson.This is the brain of the lesson being capable to add ,edit as well as book on click.This is a class that extends AnchorPane, so it can hold information.This AnchorPane will contain text as well as a certain styling when it's set by the view to visualize a lesson.
AnchorPaneNode(Model) - Constructor for class view.AnchorPaneNode
The constructor initializes the model.
